keywords.keyword: Motion DerivativeAccelerationFirst Motion DerivativeSecond Motion DerivatveVelocityWhat is...

td.para: Motion-Derivative: the rate-of-change of a motion variable, usually with respect to time or machine angle. Motion-Derivative: of Displacement are Velocity, Acceleration, and Jerk.
We derive for you each Motion-Derivative symbolically. This means that we evaluate the values of each motion-derivative exactly, at any machine-angle.
